title: Part 1 Introduction
start_text: It's Monday morning. Theodore is sitting with Nancy on the terrace of La Vita è Bella

title: 1 Introduction
start_text: This chapter covers • The tendency of OOP to increase system complexity
end_text: This paradigm is known as data-oriented programming (DOP).

title: 1.1 Introduction
start_text: Theo gets back to the office with Nancy's napkin in his pocket
end_text: Theo spends some time thinking about the organization of the system.

title: 1.1.1 The design phase
start_text: Before rushing to his laptop to code the system, Theo grabs a sheet of paper
end_text: Theo Sure! I have the diagram on my desk. We can take a look now if you like.

title: 1.1.2 UML 101
start_text: Latte in hand, Dave follows Theo to his desk.
